image.text:
Photo description window

This window is representing the description for the selected image it can be set individually for each image, it has full CSS support, it can be styled with a CSS class or with inline CSS.Please note that this window is optional, it can be disabled if you choose so.This gallery was coded for mobile devices and it is 100% mobile compatible and of course it will run just as great on PC. We have tested it on IPAD3 and it runs great, you will interact with it as you would with a native app, you can see a video demo at this link.
